name: HowHide -Easy Hide Screen, play game secretly
description: The HowHide can hide the currently running screen from view by others.  This app is for those who want to Hide Screen out at school, at home, or at work.  With this app, you can play games so that no one else knows.  By adding a convenient widget function, you can hide the screen immediately after clicking on it.    Main Features    Hide screen You can hide the current screen immediately.   Brightness control Hide You can adjust the brightness of the screen.  Easy execution You can easily perform the hide function through the widget or the status bar.
